body: While I do enjoy a good circle jerk once in a while. The meme is simply not true. As evident by the burning dumpster fire of an anarchist commune called CHAZ/CHOP, there is significant support for libertarian, collectivist movements.

body:
90% of those people don't actually want anarchy. They only care about overthrowing the current government so they can make their own even worse one, probably a communist regime.

Contrary to what they'll tell you, "libertarian" and "collectivist" are not compatible. Let's not forgot that the Spanish "anarchists" gave people the death penalty for doing things they didn't like, such as owning property or using money. I'd imagine under CHAZ anyone they identify as a "bigot" (aka not agreeing with them in 100% every way) would be executed publicly.
